title: Tutor.com
text: Tutor.com, partners with colleges and universities, Kâ€“12 schools and districts, libraries, employee benefits programs and the U.S. military to provide learners with no-cost, 1-to-1 online tutoring in English and Spanish.
featureText: Tutor.com is an online tutoring platform offered by The Princeton Review, designed to support students in various subjects and academic levels. Tutor.com connects learners with experienced tutors in real time, offering personalized help with homework, test preparation, and study skills across a wide range of disciplines. The platform operates 24/7, ensuring students have access to expert assistance whenever they need it, thus making it a flexible and convenient solution for academic support.

features.title: Extensive Data and Real-time Analytics
features.text: Tutor.com provides extensive data analytics capabilities, offering real-time insights into student performance and progress. These analytics provide actionable information for both students and educators, allowing them to track learning outcomes and make informed decisions.

features.title: Exceptional Support and On-demand Tutoring
features.text: The platform offers on-demand, online tutoring sessions across a wide range of subjects, with over 3,000 expert tutors available. Students can access tutoring support whenever they need it, ensuring flexibility and convenience in their learning process. Additionally, Tutor.com provides drop-off review services, allowing students to submit questions or assignments for feedback outside of scheduled tutoring sessions.

features.title: Expert Tutors and Effective Methodology
features.text: Tutor.com boasts a team of over 3,000 highly qualified tutors who undergo rigorous screening and ongoing development. These tutors provide multimodal instruction tailored to each student's needs, employing effective teaching methodologies. Tutor.com emphasizes empathy and privacy in its tutoring approach, aiming to create a supportive learning environment conducive to academic success.
